alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Macon; Peach; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Macon, southwestern Peach, south central Crawford and east central Taylor Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Nakomis, or near Fort Valley, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Fort Valley, Marshallville, Reynolds, Lee Pope and Nakomis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
